name: Saris Bones 2-Bike Trunk Rack
description: The Bones 2 incorporates the strength and beauty of arc-shaped elements to carry up to 2 bikes. Easy to use, you don't have to climb up or reach overhead to secure the bikes.Strong injection-moulded arms and legs.Built with 100% recyclable, non-rusting materials.Ratcheting anti-sway straps secure and stabilize bikes.Arced arms separate bikes on different levels to prevent touching and rubbing during transport.Articulated rubber feet protect the finish on your vehicle (but make sure you put them on a clean surface).Vinyl-coated hooks and cam-buckle equipped straps are quick and easy to secure.Fits most vehicles from sedans to minivans, and cars with spoilers.Be careful to make sure the rack doesn’t obscure your rear licence plate.
